summary: This is a memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York dated August 12, 2019, reporting information passed from the Special Housing Unit on August 9, 2019. It notes that inmate Reyes was going to the WAB (possibly 'Ward Administration Building' or similar) and might not return, and that inmate Epstein would need a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center who, according to the memo, would need a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit.

persons.name: Reyes
persons.context: Inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center who, according to the memo, was going to the WAB and might not return.

events.title: Information Passed from Special Housing Unit
events.description: At approximately 1:50 p.m., information was passed from the Special Housing Unit to oncoming and present shift staff regarding inmate movements. It was reported that inmate Reyes was going to the WAB and might not return, and that inmate Epstein would need a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
keyFacts: The document is a memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center dated August 12, 2019.
It reports information passed on August 9, 2019, regarding inmate movements within the facility.
It specifically notes that inmate Epstein would need a cellmate upon returning from an attorney visit.
The document originates just days before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019, making it a potentially relevant record concerning his final days in custody.
